title: Taskbar overlapping the game
body:
why does this task bar keep overlapping the bottom part of the screen, it makes me accidentally tab out and prevents me from seeing my hp/mana bars. It's annoying af and I can't get rid of it 

(I play fullscreen too btw) 

help please :(

replies.body:
This might have something to do with a possible corrupted configuration file in the league directory. If you don't mind, let's try resetting those first to see if that fixes it!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Let me know how that helps!
